sentences.en: Experts put / set a high valuation on the painting.
sentences.cn: 专家对这幅画估价很高.

sentences.en: If you are selling your property, why not call us for a free valuation without obligation?
sentences.cn: 如果您打算出售房产，何不打电话让我们作免费估价呢？

sentences.en: It had dawned upon me that I have never placed a proper valuation upon womankind.
sentences.cn: 我这才觉得,我一向不曾对女性给以应有的估价.

sentences.en: Once in 3 years valuation report should be obtained in writing.
sentences.cn: 书面的估价报告应当3年提交一次.

sentences.en: One of his responsibilities is fighting against a superstitious valuation of Europe.
sentences.cn: 他要以反对盲目崇拜欧洲为己任.

sentences.en: Pound's valuation was the same as mine.
She asked for a valuation of her house.
sentences.cn: 她要求对她的房舍作一估价.

sentences.en: Surveyors carried out a valuation of the property.
sentences.cn: 鉴定人员对这处房产做了估价。

sentences.en: Surveyors carried out a valuation on / of our house.
sentences.cn: 测量员对我们的房子做出了估价.

sentences.en: The furniture had been bought at a valuation.
sentences.cn: 那套家具是按估定的价格买来的.

sentences.en: The property has a valuation of $1.6 billion.
sentences.cn: 那处房地产估价为16亿美元。

sentences.en: The valuation of stocks is a difficult and sometimes contentious matter.
sentences.cn: 存货的价值很难计算,有时还会引起争议的.

sentences.en: There are series of valuation results in China since the late 1980 s.
sentences.cn: 在实践上得出了一系列评估结果.

sentences.en: Valuation lies at the heart of all takeovers.
sentences.cn: 所有收购者心中都有自己的估价。

sentences.en: Valuation of US - 2020 urinary sediment automatic analyzer in clinical application.
sentences.cn: US -2020 全自动尿沉渣分析仪的临床应用评价.

sentences.en: We also give a brief treatment of valuation.
sentences.cn: 我们还简单地讨论一下赋值.

words.tran_cn: 有价值的；贵重的；可估价的
重要的；宝贵的；贵重的；经估价的
无价值的；不值钱的；微不足道的
值；价值；价格；重要性；确切涵义
评价者；估价者；价格核定人

phrases.tran_cn: 上市公司股票市值；市场估价

trans.tran_cn: 估价，估定的价格或价值，定价，评价
trans.tran_en: a professional judgment about how much something is worth
